attributes.title: Pig and dog go fly fly so sad
attributes.review: I am so disappointed there was a big Cheeto man when I was gonna make an account Cheeto man scared my dog and my dog started throwing up and then the pigs in my backyard and in the basement started flying my dog  was so scared and started acting like a bunny and accidentally jumped on the pigs back and it went up and up and I haven’t seen my dog in 7 hours and my pig in the basement screaming trump 2020 but as a pig and it’s scaring me It also makes your phone glitch and say trump 2020 a lot and sends you pictures of a  fat Cheeto man and calls you and says trump 2020 I think dump 2020 same thing tho right anyways I do not suggest this unless you want dog throw up and pigs flying and making a mess

attributes.title: I AM APALLED! 😡😟🤕😞🤬😱
attributes.review: This app is COMPLETELY DISGUSTING! I cannot not believe my own two eye balls. When I first opened the app, it showed me a picture of SHREK NAKED! 🤢🤮 I DID NOT GIVE CONSENT TO SEE SUCH A INAPPROPRIATE SCENE! I DO NOT suggest you download this app unless you want to be utterly disturbed. This app should be removed at once. That was not the only thing either, it wouldn’t even take any of my information and it called me the most offensive names out loud in front of my entire family which includes a 1 1/2 year old. That is UNACCEPTABLE! 🤬😡😤 Not only that, but it also advertises public nudity and pornography. I will never recommend this to anyone and I wish I never downloaded this app. Absolutely astounding and horrific. 😤

attributes.title: HELP MY HEART
attributes.review: Ok first off who even is this guy🤨 i was trying to have a nice day and download games to distract myself from the ongoing pandemic only to find this guys app on my phone??? So i open my phone right and i wasnt scared cause he looks like a fat greasy cheeto😸so i didnt think he could hurt😾 me🙀 BUT HE DID. THIS MAN(nvm🙄🙄 BOY*** hes to stupid to be a real man) this BOY literally is the reason i have CARDIOMYOPATHY a heart issue caused by stress which weakened my heart muscles significantly!!!🧍🏼‍♀️ I was so scared because his fat face and disgusting political views were able to shock and stress me so much that i basically went into heart failure. So unfortunately i have to leave a one star ⭐️ 😕 review 😻. Sorry! Better luck next time you rapist! ❤️

attributes.title: So bad
attributes.review: As the nice, gun-loving, racist, homophobic, transphobic, rapist, American i am, this app was absolutely horrible. First off, the app took waaaay longer to load than any of my other apps, then when the app finally decided to open it crashed just like the career of our small minded and small dick president’s career. After it crashed about 10 different times it finally loaded. Once it loaded I was greeted with the warm welcoming of our president’s hot breath (it really affects you through the screen). Once i got back up after dying of heat stroke, I was so thrilled to use the app. Only for it to crash me out. I would give it no stars but since I have to, it stays at 1 star for me 💅.

attributes.title: 0/10 recommend this app
attributes.review: i am 59 and as i opened the app, i immediately started feeling this feeling all throughout my body. i felt really ill and weak. i didn’t know what was going on so i turned my phone off and i immediately felt way better. i was like what??? how??? so i got back on my phone (which the app was still opened) i started to feel sick again. i don’t know what happened. weirdest thing that’s ever happened to me. i believe this app is cursed, trump has a curse on the app to make you vote for him. thank the lord that i was able to get healed. i pray for all of you who have been cursed and voted for tramp, i mean trump. KCUF DLANOD PMURT. please remove this app for everyone’s safety.

attributes.title: Awful App
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking i would get some of them good, juicy carrot photos. Instead, i opened the app and immediately got HORRID diarrhea. I’m talking explosive type diarrhea like on spongebob at gloveworld. Now, because i downloaded this app, my butthole is tore open and i can’t seem to stop the liquids from secreting out of my pores. I am seeking financial compensation for the stitches i had to receive which made me constipated for at least 2 months as well as the embarrassment that came with me walking around smelling like left over tuna casserole that was neglected and not put in the fridge for 69 years. Please don’t download this app. I cant even walk out of my house anymore.

attributes.title: Not safe!!
attributes.review: Once I downloaded the app and entered my info and what not, it asked if it could access my location. I then clicked allow. Ever since there has been a weird group of people outside of my window each night chanting “JOIN US, TRUMP 2020.” along with my name. I called the police last night and once they got there they joined in. My neighbor walked out of her home to see what was going on and when she very kindly asked the officer he tackled and arrested her!! The people also took my dog and stole my golf cart and are refusing to return unless i join them. They looked like a group of white supremacists and my dog has black and brown fur!! I fear for both the life of my dog and golf cart.

attributes.title: THIS APP HACKED MY PHONE😖😫😡
attributes.review: i downloaded this app with such jitters and excitement rushing through my body! because i love donald 😫😍🥵 but when i opened the app it redirected me to my camera roll and there i saw hundreds among hundreds of crude and NSFW photos of ANDREW JACKSON. i was baffled as to why these photos were there but then i realized the app downloaded all these photos into my camera roll!!! so disappointed... so hurt😞☹️😭 i tried getting rid of the photos but they kept on reappearing 💔💔 this app is terrible! it won’t let me delete it on my phone either and the app has been hacking through my social media and posting pictures of Donny trump, sitting on the toilet 😩🤢  THIS APP IS RUINING MY LIFE, PLEASE HELP 😓😥😰😨😱
